text: Two for the Seesaw is a 1962 American romantic drama movie directed by Robert Wise and was based on the 1958 play of the same name. It stars Robert Mitchum, Shirley MacLaine, Edmon Ryan, Elisabeth Fraser, Eddie Firestone and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1963. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1962 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Robert Wise
title: Two for the Seesaw
